data.meta_description: Obituary for Arlene (Heasley)  Quinn | Arlene Quinn (Quintiliani) 87, passed away peacefully on April 4, 2023. She was born December 27th, 1935 in New Castle, Pennsylvania to the late Rachel (D’Errico) and James P....
data.meta_site_name: Arlene Quinn Obituary | April 4, 2023 | New Castle, PA
data.text:
Arlene Quinn (Quintiliani) 87, passed away peacefully on April 4, 2023. She was born December 27th, 1935 in New Castle, Pennsylvania to the late Rachel (D’Errico) and James P. Heasley. Arlene was married to Anthony Quinn (Quintiliani), who proceeded her in death in 1998. Arlene was devout in her faith, enjoyed cooking for her family & friends, volunteering, and gardening.

She worked for 32 years at St. Francis Hospital in the Finance Department. After retirement she worked at Toles & Trinkets in Volant and Duke’s Sport Shop. She was a loving Mother and Grandmother and enjoyed spending time with her Grandchildren. She loved her home at 933 Clarence Avenue in New Castle, PA where she lived for many years before becoming a residence of Rhodes Estates in New Castle.

Arlene was a Roman Catholic, a member of St. Joseph Church, and the Mary Martha Guild. She is survived by Son Marc (Julie) Quinn of Pittsburgh and Son Jeffrey (Karla) Quinn of Westport, Connecticut and her Grandchildren: Kristi (Eric) Carroll, Emily, Collin, and Dillon Quinn of Pittsburgh, Cole Quinn of Westport, and Ryan Quinn of Boston, MA. She is also survived by Sisters Audrey Maiella, Connie Likovich, and Beverly (Duke) Morosky. She will be dearly missed by her family, her nieces and nephews, and many friends.

Calling hours for Arlene will be held on Monday April 10, 2023 from 4-8 at Noga Funeral Home, Inc., 1142 S. Mill Street. A Mass of Christian Burial will take place on Tuesday April 11, 2023 at 11 Am at Holy Spirit Parish- Mary Mother of Hope site. Father Aaron Kriss will officiate. Burial will take place at St. Mary’s Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, memorial donations may be made in Arlene’s name to St. Jude’s Children’s Hospital.
